meta.name: Tech Cyberpunk
meta.description: 赛博朋克风格，霓虹配色，适合前沿科技、AI、编程

base.container: background-color: #0a0e27; color: #e0e6ed; font-family: 'JetBrains Mono', 'Fira Code', monospace; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.7; padding: 20px;
base.link: color: #00fff5; text-decoration: none; text-shadow: 0 0 10px #00fff5; border-bottom: 1px solid #00fff5;

header_window.style: background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ff00ff20, #00fff520); border: 1px solid #ff00ff; border-radius: 4px; padding: 12px 20px; margin-bottom: 25px; box-shadow: 0 0 20px #ff00ff40, inset 0 0 20px #ff00ff10;
header_window.title_style: color: #00fff5; font-size: 12px; text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 2px; text-shadow: 0 0 10px #00fff5;

headings.h2: background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ff00ff, #00fff5); -webkit-background-clip: text; -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent; background-clip: text; font-size: 20px; font-weight: bold; margin: 25px 0 15px; text-shadow: 0 0 30px #ff00ff40; padding-left: 15px; border-left: 3px solid #ff00ff;
headings.h3: color: #ff00ff; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold; margin: 20px 0 10px; text-shadow: 0 0 10px #ff00ff60;
headings.h1: background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ff00ff, #00fff5); -webkit-background-clip: text; -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent; background-clip: text; font-size: 20px; font-weight: bold; margin: 25px 0 15px; text-shadow: 0 0 30px #ff00ff40; padding-left: 15px; border-left: 3px solid #ff00ff;
headings.h4: font-size: 15px; font-weight: bold; margin-bottom: 8px; color: #57606a; margin-top: 20px;

text.code_inline: background-color: #1a1a2e; color: #ff00ff; padding: 3px 6px; border-radius: 3px; border: 1px solid #ff00ff40; font-size: 90%;

blocks.code_block: background-color: #0d1117; border: 1px solid #30363d; color: #00fff5; padding: 16px; border-radius: 6px; margin: 16px 0; font-size: 13px; box-shadow: 0 0 20px #00fff520;
blocks.quote_tip: background-color: #16213e; border: 1px solid #00fff5; color: #00fff5; padding: 12px 16px; margin: 16px 0; border-radius: 4px; box-shadow: 0 0 15px #00fff520;
blocks.quote_warning: background-color: #2d1b2d; border: 1px solid #ff00ff; color: #ff00ff; padding: 12px 16px; margin: 16px 0; border-radius: 4px; box-shadow: 0 0 15px #ff00ff40;
blocks.hr: border: 0; height: 1px; background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, #ff00ff, #00fff5, transparent); margin: 30px 0;
blocks.quote_note: background-color: #e8f4fd; border-left: 4px solid #0969da; color: #0c3d6a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.quote_info: background-color: #def7ff; border-left: 4px solid #58a6ff; color: #0c447a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.quote_default: background-color: #f6f8fa; border-left: 4px solid #57606a; color: #57606a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.details: background-color: #f6f8fa; border: 1px solid #d0d7de; border-radius: 6px; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px;
blocks.summary: font-weight: bold; cursor: pointer; color: #0969da; margin-bottom: 8px;

media.image_placeholder: background-color: #16213e; border: 2px dashed #ff00ff60; color: #00fff5; padding: 20px; text-align: center; margin: 16px 0; border-radius: 4px; font-size: 12px;
media.image: max-width: 100%; height: auto; display: block; margin: 15px 0; border-radius: 4px;

footer.style: margin-top: 40px; padding-top: 20px; border-top: 1px solid #ff00ff40; text-align: center;

math.inline: background-color: #f6f8fa; padding: 2px 6px; border-radius: 4px; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-style: italic;
math.block: background-color: #f6f8fa; padding: 15px; border-radius: 6px; text-align: center; margin: 15px 0; overflow-x: auto; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;
